title: The Power of Desire in Everyday Life: Wanting and Social Change
itunes:title: The Power of Desire in Everyday Life: Wanting and Social Change
description: Luke Burgis, the author of the just-released book "Wanting," talks about his book, how we come to desire what we desire, and how we can transform desire so as to make the world a better place.
